attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is an estemated 2,000,000 smokers of canabis in the uk (i think there is more)
If it was sold at £10 a pack. Take 10% off for tax. If 2,000,000 people buy there 1 pack a week it could generate £2,000,000 a week for the goverment. This can be used to for alot of things. It can run clinics to help the more heavy users. It can also go into the NHS, and also go towards police to manage it.
Just think £104,000,000 a year will go along way.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
